thread.title: United Continental Unravels Image From Former CEO Jeff Smisek

author: Susan Carey
title: United Continental Unravels Image From Former CEO Jeff Smisek
text:
Jeff Smisek, the ousted United Continental Holdings Inc. boss, was one of the airline industryâ€™s most publicly recognized executives, largely because his visage appeared thousands of times daily introducing the safety video United shows to passengers before takeoff.
Now, among the challenges the airline faces is disentangling its image from that of the silver-haired Mr. Smisek, who abruptly resigned Tuesday as chairman and chief executive following a company investigation related to a federal probe of the Port Authority...
